channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Debate flares over how quickly to replace many lead service lines
item.description: The EPA is trying to crack down on lead pipes that bring water into homes. But a looming deadline — and the election — will determine if it follows a Biden plan to replace pipes or a Trump plan.
item.content:encoded:
The EPA is trying to crack down on lead pipes that bring water into homes. But a looming deadline — and the election — will determine if it follows a Biden plan to replace pipes or a Trump plan.

(Image credit: Seth Wenig)
item.dc:creator: Sandy West

item.title: Boeing will plead guilty to fraud and Hurricane Beryl lands in Texas
item.description: Boeing agrees to plead guilty to a criminal fraud charge stemming from two fatal Max 727 crashes in 2018 and 2019. Hurricane Beryl has made landfall in Texas.
item.content:encoded:
Boeing agrees to plead guilty to a criminal fraud charge stemming from two fatal Max 727 crashes in 2018 and 2019. Hurricane Beryl has made landfall in Texas.

(Image credit: SAUL LOEB/AFP via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Suzanne Nuyen

item.title: There's been a stunning upset in the weekend elections in France
item.description: In results that defied polls, France’s far-right national rally party was relegated to third place in legislative elections, routed by a diverse leftist coalition cobbled together only weeks ago.
item.content:encoded: In results that defied polls, France’s far-right national rally party was relegated to third place in legislative elections, routed by a diverse leftist coalition cobbled together only weeks ago.
item.dc:creator: Eleanor Beardsley

item.title: Paid or unpaid, child care is vital to the economy. This program recognizes that
item.description: In Arizona, a program called Kith and Kin teaches mothers, grandmothers, aunts, friends and neighbors who watch other people's children the skills they need to provide high quality care.
item.content:encoded:
In Arizona, a program called Kith and Kin teaches mothers, grandmothers, aunts, friends and neighbors who watch other people's children the skills they need to provide high quality care.

(Image credit: Andrea Hsu)
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hsu

item.title: Biden’s in trouble. That puts more scrutiny on Harris too
item.description: Vice President Harris, 59, would be a leading contender if President Biden steps aside from the 2024 race. Even if he stays in, Republicans are making her an issue.
item.content:encoded:
Vice President Harris, 59, would be a leading contender if President Biden steps aside from the 2024 race. Even if he stays in, Republicans are making her an issue.

(Image credit: Arturo Holmes/Getty Images for ESSENCE)
item.dc:creator: Asma Khalid

item.title: Doctors try a controversial technique to reduce the transplant organ shortage
item.description: Doctors say they can boost the odds donated organs will be usable by restarting blood circulation with a pump after donors are declared dead. Critics say the procedure blurs the definition of death.
item.content:encoded:
Doctors say they can boost the odds donated organs will be usable by restarting blood circulation with a pump after donors are declared dead. Critics say the procedure blurs the definition of death.

(Image credit: Jessica Tezak for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Rob Stein

item.title: The Texas Gulf Coast braces for the effects from Hurricane Beryl
item.description: Beryl is bringing heavy rains and flooding to Texas on Monday. The long-lived tropical system first walloped the Windward Islands, Jamaica, and Mexico before threatening the United States.
item.content:encoded: Beryl is bringing heavy rains and flooding to Texas on Monday. The long-lived tropical system first walloped the Windward Islands, Jamaica, and Mexico before threatening the United States.
item.dc:creator: Greg Allen

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Four senior House Democrats in private call said President Biden should step aside. French left coalition finishes election on top. Boeing to plead guilty to criminal fraud in deal with prosecutors.
item.content:encoded: Four senior House Democrats in private call said President Biden should step aside. French left coalition finishes election on top. Boeing to plead guilty to criminal fraud in deal with prosecutors.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: How the Supreme Court's immunity decision affects Trump's legal cases
item.description: The Supreme Court found presidents have absolute immunity for exercising core constitutional powers. The team at Trump's Trials podcast broke down how the decision could affect Trump’s legal cases.
item.content:encoded:
The Supreme Court found presidents have absolute immunity for exercising core constitutional powers. The team at Trump's Trials podcast broke down how the decision could affect Trump’s legal cases.

(Image credit: Mandel Ngan)
item.dc:creator: Tyler Bartlam

item.title: Why some Republican-led states are limiting who can vote in party primaries
item.description: Some Republican-led states are going against a broader trend and restricting who can participate in primary elections, in an effort to have more ideological purity among their nominees.
item.content:encoded:
Some Republican-led states are going against a broader trend and restricting who can participate in primary elections, in an effort to have more ideological purity among their nominees.

(Image credit: Michael Johnson)
item.dc:creator: Ashley Lopez
